g.text: 1D chains and 2D layers based on AuX
pseudo-octahedral building blocks. At room temperature,
both crystals show a weak blue emission, which originates from the electronic transition between
featuring perovskite-derived 1D chains and 2D layers based on AuX
blocks. At room temperature, both crystals show a weak blue emission, which originates from the
electronic transition between Au-6s and Au-5d.

reacting with OA to form Ag−oleate
and In−oleate and oleylammonium chlorine. Ag
NPs are formed by the reduction of Ag+ in the
presence of amine ligands; (III) formation of Cs
